# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its unique features and capabilities make it invaluable for anyone looking to elevate their experience. Given its exceptional nature, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $18000. This represents an opportunity to acquire a piece that could significantly enhance your life or business. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this special offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
